articles.description: Viewers have questioned how the hit animated series seemingly ‘knew about coronavirus nine months ago’
articles.content:
Fans of the hit animated series Rick and Morty have expressed their surprise after a joke about the coronavirus pandemic made it into the latest episode.
The episode, entitled Never Ricking Morty, features a scene in which Morty (voiced by Justin Roiland) sa… [+1239 chars]

articles.description:
